structure.unit: Control Of Outdoor Advertising Adjacent To The Interstate And Primary Highway Systems

law.catch_line: Maps, Informational Directories And Advertising Pamphlets
law.text: The department is hereby authorized to maintain maps and to permit informational directories and advertising pamphlets to be made available at safety rest areas, and to establish centers at safety rest areas for the purpose of informing the public of places of interest within the commonwealth and providing such other information as may be considered desirable.
